contentUrl.title: Content URL
contentUrl.description: The download URL of the media object

encodingFormat.title: Encoding Format
encodingFormat.description: The media type of the media object, conforming to https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xml

contentSize.title: Content Size
contentSize.description: The size of the media object in bytes (B) without units.

sha256.title: sha256
sha256.description: The SHA-2 SHA256 hash of the content of the media object.

embedUrl.title: Embed URL
embedUrl.description: A URL pointing to a player for a video. In general, this is the information in the src element of an embed tag.

bitrate.title: Bitrate
bitrate.description: The bitrate of an audio or video object in kilobyte per second (kb/s) without units.
